resources.string:
Sorry, you can not use the app for some unknown reasons. You can try again in the following ways:
 1. If VPN is turned on, please turn off VPN. 
2. If the mobile phone is root, please change the phone. 
3. Your IP may be identified as a cheating user. Please use the normal IP. 
Thank you for your support of our app
Your network is unstable, please check the network
The Privacy Policy and User Agreement
You have copy the invitation code!
Invite your friends by below code to use this App and reward you points.

Hi,my dear friends ,I am using the app "Amusing Reward" now,you can get rewards from it,also you can experience the APP from the link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.amusing.cash.well.fun ,when you first open it ,you can input my invitation code :
Do you want to watch video to get more points?
Input your invitation code that your friends share you,and you can get points.
Invitation code can not be null!
You miss somethings,you should input all!
You have not activity in progress
To count correctly and earn coins, click the "Start" button to activate the app.
In order to correctly calculate the duration and reward you with coins,please turn on the app usage permission first.
There is only one chance to exchange the reward once a day, and then the number of steps will not be redeemable for points. Are you sure to redeem?
In order to record the steps of your motion more accurately, need to obtain the motion data of your phone.
In order to show the number of movement steps when you are moving and when you lock the screen, need to obtain the pop-up window permission of your phone.
Change one Coin every 10xx steps,the more you walk,the more you earn,you can exchange 1,200xx Coin for 10,000xx steps
This is a wall for you that you can get unless points by task
You points now is xxx,when you is 100%,you can exchange reward.
Input your invitation code that your friends share you,and you can get points.
It is not time for the task to start.
Sorry, you don not have enough points
Redeem account can not be null.
The redeem accounts entered twice are inconsistent.
Please open your wallet check the money in the account
Please input your redeem account for twice
Happy Reward finds good games for you
Get coins while you playing games
Exchange the reward you want with coins
Complete tasks to win a lot of coins
Play games or apps to earn more coins.
Here is your coins.Complete task to gain coins.The higher the coin the higher the reward
This is the first step of the task.The more steps you complete,the more rewards you get!
Only xxx coins left to redeem!
Coins can be exchanged for cash, and the larger the exchanged amount, the greater the discount. Different amounts can be exchanged once a day.
